page.title: 09Weekend Pastimes
page.content: A survey of school children in Rivenhall showed a great variety of activities are taken part in at the weekend.The girls go swimming,play with pets,go out for a drive with their parents,go to the pub,watch television,go to ballet and do homework.The boys spend their weekends fishing,playing with friends,BMX training,,going to church,Go-carting, climbing trees,watching television, playing with a computer and visiting friends with their parents.The tendency is for boys to be keener on hobbies than girls.The boys belong to Young Ornithologists,Boys Brigade, Cubs,Scouts and Fishing club.The girls are members of Hector Club(for Help the Aged),Brownies,Hedgehog Club and Little Extra Club.
